comments:
Regression in build epf-composer-1.0-M3-N20060608-win32.  I could not get this error to occur in epf-composer-1.0-M3-N20060607-1-win32.

Move a role from one plugin to another.  (The error does not always occur, but if it doesn't happen on the first move I could reliably produce it by moving the element back to the original place).  During the move, an error dialog comes up with "Error during move".  The following is in the details section:

An error has occurred. Click Details for more information.
  Error saving file(s)
    org.eclipse.epf.persistence.MultiFileIOException: Resource is out of synch and needs to be reloaded: C:\Documents and Settings\jhardy\EPF\Method Libraries\Jeff2Lib\Plug1\plugin.xmi
	at org.eclipse.epf.persistence.MultiFileSaveUtil.checkOutOfSynch(MultiFileSaveUtil.java:457)
	at org.eclipse.epf.persistence.MethodLibraryPersister$FailSafePersister.adjustLocation(MethodLibraryPersister.java:629)
	at org.eclipse.epf.library.edit.command.MethodElementAddCommand$MoveOperation.save(MethodElementAddCommand.java:1795)
	at org.eclipse.epf.library.edit.command.MethodElementAddCommand$MoveOperation.access$3(MethodElementAddCommand.java:1775)
	at org.eclipse.epf.library.edit.command.MethodElementAddCommand$4.run(MethodElementAddCommand.java:1560)
	at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run(ModalContext.java:113)

The lastModified time stamp that saved with the resource and used to check the file for out-of-synch is not updated when saving the file. This fix will also fix other issue related to unexpected error "Resource is out of synch" as well.

traces.message: Resource is out of synch and needs to be reloaded: C:\Documents and Settings\jhardy\EPF\Method Libraries\Jeff2Lib\Plug1\plugin.xmi
